dcterms:creator: Eiji Aramaki
Sachiko Maskawa
Mizuki Morita
dcterms:description: A dataset used for classifying tweets related to influenza infection, distinguishing between tweets that report an infection and those that provide information about influenza.
dcterms:title: Influenza Infection Classification (IIC)

dcterms:creator: Keyuan Jiang
Ricardo Calix
Matrika Gupta
dcterms:description: A dataset for classifying tweets that describe the usage of medicinal drugs, identifying tweets that report drug usage.
dcterms:title: Drug Usage Classification (DUC)

dcterms:creator: Bella Robinson
Ross Sparks
Robert Power
Mark Cameron
dcterms:description: A dataset for classifying personal health mentions in tweets, identifying tweets that report personal health issues.
dcterms:title: Personal Health Mention Classification (PHMC)
